name: Professor William Lake
traits: Enthusiastic, adventurous, often has dirt under his fingernails.
motivation: To prove his controversial theory that a vast, non-human civilization existed in Antarctica millions of years ago.
secret: He has received strange, fossilized rock samples from an expedition that show impossible, five-pointed radial patterns. He is planning a new expedition to the Antarctic to find more.
hook: The investigators need to identify a strange mineral or consult an expert on unusual geological formations.
